name: Low Gravity Shooter Prototype
description:
Prototype #2 / 11

This game is one of the prototypes made in a week as part of the "souls-like prototyping" challenge.

  • Genre: shooter
  • Unusual game mechanics: movement using weapon

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • SPACE - Jump
  • LMB - Shoot
  • R - Reload
  • Q - Look back
